summary.para: Initializes the object that hosts an object.

param.name: hwndParent
param.para: The handle of the window that contains the object.

param.name: pdo
param.para: The address of a pointer to a data object.

param.name: prc
param.para: The address of a pointer to a RECT structure that specifies the dimensions of the folder view.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes a method that hosts an object in a window.
